Class RecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecordController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlobalConstants

    public class RecordController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GlobalConstants
    RecordController controls the process of record filling.
    Author:
    Yelyzaveta Horbachenko

                          java.lang.String input)
        Check the value with regular expression.
        Parameters:
        regex - regular expression
        input - message which user inputs
        Returns:
        true if value is correct, and false if it is not

      • inputData

        public java.lang.String inputData(java.util.Scanner sc,
                                  java.lang.String regex,
                                  java.lang.String message)
        Method asks to input correct data. Writes a rule every time user makes a mistake. By using checkInput checks if the input is correct.
        Parameters:
        sc - scanner
        regex - regular expression
        message - message with a rule.
        Returns:
        correct value

      • inputDataWithScanner

        Controls input of all data.
        Returns:

      • userCheckInput

        public boolean userCheckInput(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Asks user to write yes or no. Made specially to ask if user wants to write down his second mobile number
        Parameters:
        sc - scanner
        Returns:
        return true if user input yes, and false if no.
